title: Racism and hate speech
body:
Look, I have been known to swear and what not now and then... I am by no means an angel. I just played a ranked game with a guy who AFKd 10 mins in to purely type racial abuse for the next 10 mins until we had to surrender. This behaviour is a joke, accounts should be perma-banned for it... Hands down.
**[REMOVED]**    <- This guy really needs looking into
I'm white and I felt insulted by it, I can't imagine how the two Chinese fellas felt. Disgusting!!!
Please let me know if this gets taken care, I can take a fair bit of abuse but the trash this guy was typing to the other guys... Wow.\
No space for racism, especially in a region so culturally diverse, only inbred sister lovers would deem it as okay. Jus sayin'
Much love,
Peace x
